articles.author: Claudia Chiappa
articles.title: Serbian president turns to Russia amid rising tensions with Kosovo after monastery gun battle - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Russia says it is watching ‘closely’ the situation in Kosovo, which is ‘very tense’ and ‘potentially dangerous.’
articles.content:
Serbia has turned to its longtime ally Russia after Kosovo accused it of orchestrating an attack in an ethnic Serbian-majority region of northern Kosovo on Sunday.
Serbian President Aleksandar Vui m… [+2008 chars]
